name: Mr Ludo Online Multiplayer
description:
Play the classic board game of Ludo wherever you are! Play online or offline with the hilarious Mr Ludo office characters! Can you escape the office before your opponents? With over 1 Million downloads and a lively community, Mr Ludo is the most best, most popular Ludo game for iOS! Come join us and have fun playing the classic game of Ludo!

Key Features:

• Mr Ludo! Hilarious Mr Ludo characters that will make you cry with laughter!
• Play against friends or other players from around the world.
• Interactive, real-time online play for up to 4 players.
• VIP status – Want to get out of the office early? (without having to roll a SIX)
• Leaderboards that track your career progress, both globally and against your Facebook friends.
• Additional Express Mode – Play a quick game if you are in a hurry or on a short lunch break.
• Offline Mode – Play on the same device or against the AI!
• Super-emoticons – YES! Express all your joys and frustrations of the game! :P
• Six vastly different environments - From tropical islands to wacky outer space.
• Super connectivity – works on 3G & WiFi – Also allows you to resume if you are disconnected.

So what are you waiting for? It's time to roll the dice, escape the office early and leave your fellow co-workers to finish your work! You deserve it!

Enjoy this fantastic online multiplayer game and re-live the good old Ludo days!
